SPELL_ABILITY.LOCALISED_TEXT: Tap up to two target creatures.
Tap up to two target creatures.

SPELL_ABILITY.TARGET_DEFINITION: local filter = Object():GetFilter() filter:Clear() filter:AddCardType( CARD_TYPE_CREATURE ) filter:SetZone( ZONE_IN_PLAY ) filter:SetHint( HINT_ENEMY, EffectController() )
SPELL_ABILITY.PLAY_TIME_ACTION: EffectController():SetTargetCount( 2 ) for i=0,1 do EffectController():SetTargetPrompt( i, "CARD_QUERY_CHOOSE_CREATURE_TAP" ) end EffectController():ChooseTargetsWithFlags( 0, EffectDC():Make_Targets(0), QUERY_FLAG_CAN_BE_FINISHED_EARLY + QUERY_FLAG_CAN_BE_FINISHED_EARLY_FOR_AI_AS_WELL )
SPELL_ABILITY.RESOLUTION_TIME_ACTION: for i = 0,1 do local target = EffectDC():Get_Targets(0):Get_CardPtr(i) if target ~= nil then target:Tap() end end
